content: pattakkaaran:- (patinjaarottu thirinju rooshmaa cheythukondu) pithaavaam dyvatthin്re snehavum…
Pattakkaaran :- (kykal uyartthikkondu) ee naazhikayil naam ellaavaruteyum bodhangalum…
janam :- njangalute bodhangalum vichaarangalum hrudayangalum dyvamaaya kartthaavinkal irikkunnu.
janam :- bhayabhakthiyote kartthaavine sthothram cheyyunnathu yukthavum nyaayavum aakunnu.

janam :- than്re sthuthikalaal aakaashavum bhoomiyum niranjirikkunna balavaanaaya dyvamthampuraan parishuddhan, parishuddhan, parishuddhan, uyarangalil ooshaana. Dyvamaaya kartthaavinte thirunaamatthil vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Uyarangalil sthuthi.

janam :- njangalute kartthaave! Nin്re maranatthe njangal orkkukayum ninte uyirtthezhunnelpine njangal ettu parayukayum nin്re randaamatthe ezhunnallatthinaayi njangal nokkippaarkkukayum cheyyunnu. Ninte anugra hangal njangal ellaavarute melum undaayirikkename.

moutthoku moraan mesa-hadeenaan
vabayomathok-moude-naan
valmeseesok-hoyu dthartthen msaa-kkenaan
virahamaykku nehavun-al koolaan.

naathaa! Nin mruthiyortthengal
nin uththaanamathe-ttothi
kaakkunnu nin punaraa-gamanam,
vaazhavaruluka - njangal-kkellaam.

janam :- sarvvashakthiyulla pithaavaam dyvame, njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Dyvamaaya kartthaave, ninne njangal sthuthikkukayum vaazhtthukayum vandikkukayum ninnotu njangal apekshikkukayum cheyyunnu. Utthamanaayullove! Karuna thonni njangalutemel anugraham cheyyaname.

shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, ente vaathsalyamullavare, jeevanulla parishuddha roohaa, svarggamaakunna melulla uyarangalilninnu prathaapatthotukooti irangi, vaykkappettirikkunna ee parishuddha kurbbaanamel porunni aavasicchu athine shuddheekarikkunna ee naazhika ethra bhayankaravum, ee samayam ethra bhramikkatthakkathumaakunnu. Ningal atakkatthotum bhayatthotum ninnukondu praarththippin.
Janam :- njangalellaavarotumkoote samaadhaanavum njanga lkkellaavarkkum sampreethiyum undaayirikkename.
